mapper.select: SELECT wa.idx, ai.file_name, a.idx AS accom_idx, a.accom_name, la.large_area_name FROM tbl_wishlist_accom wa, tbl_accom_images ai, tbl_accom a, tbl_large_area la WHERE wa.accom_idx = a.idx AND ai.accom_idx = a.idx AND a.large_area_idx = la.idx AND wa.member_idx = #{member.idx} ORDER BY wa.idx DESC OFFSET (#{cri.currPage} -1) * #{cri.amount} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{cri.amount} ROWS ONLY

SELECT wp.idx, wp.travel_plan_idx, la.large_area_name, m.nickname, tp.likes, tp.days as total_days FROM tbl_wishlist_plan wp, tbl_travel_plan tp, tbl_large_area la, tbl_member m WHERE wp.travel_plan_idx = tp.idx AND tp.large_area_idx = la.idx AND tp.member_idx = m.idx (+) AND wp.member_idx = #{member.idx} AND tp.is_public = 'Y' ORDER BY wp.idx DESC OFFSET (#{cri.currPage} -1) * #{cri.amount} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{cri.amount} ROWS ONLY

SELECT
tpd.place_type, a.accom_name, tpd.place_name, tpd.place_seq FROM tbl_travel_plan_detail tpd, tbl_reservation r, tbl_accom_room ar, tbl_accom a, tbl_travel_plan tp WHERE tpd.reservation_idx = r.idx (+) AND r.accom_room_idx = ar.idx (+) AND ar.accom_idx = a.idx (+) AND tp.idx = tpd.travel_plan_idx (+) AND travel_plan_idx = #{travelPlanIdx} AND tpd.day = #{day} AND tp.is_public = 'Y' ORDER BY tpd.place_seq
